attributes.action: Make RuPaul host of every show
attributes.additional_details: All shows are made better with drag. Improve all shows.
attributes.background: Make RuPaul of RuPaul’s Drag Race U.K. the host of every show on the BBC

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

It is up to RuPaul whether to accept offers to host a television show or sashay away, not the Government or House of Commons.
